title: Branching out
creator_credit: Bill Latto and Town and Country Productions
brief_description: Shows how the four senior branch sections of the Girl Guide Associations - Air, Land, and Sea Rangers and Cadets, provide modern and lively training with popular appeal for the teenage girl. Training includes gliding, rock climbing, flower arranging, pony trekking, boating, music appreciation, hostessing and welfare work. An International Mixed Camp provides the girls wiht an opportunity of mixing with their contemporaries from other countries.
